meanings.definition: Move or run quickly and suddenly.
meanings.sent1: She dartling across the playground to catch the ball.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit dartling through the field startled the farmer.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel dartling around the tree looked like a tiny superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts dartling from one idea to the next made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The dartling hummingbird hovered near the flower, its wings a blur of color.

meanings.definition: A quick, sudden movement or action.
meanings.sent1: His dartling towards the finish line secured the victory.
meanings.sent2: The sudden dartling of the fish in the pond caught her eye.
meanings.sent3: The dartling of the squirrel stealing the nuts was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The dartling of the lightning across the sky was both beautiful and frightening.
meanings.sent5: The dartling of the cheetah as it chased its prey was a sight to behold.
